hero.title: Stop Forgetting What You Learn
hero.description: Turn YouTube videos, articles, and PDFs into long-term memory ‚Äî automatically. Upload your syllabus. Watch content. Review 3 min/day. Actually remember.

features.title: How It Works
features.description: A simple 3-step process to transform any content into long-term knowledge

extraction.title: AI Concept Extraction
extraction.description: Watch a video or read an article. Our AI automatically extracts key concepts and creates atomic knowledge cards.

matching.title: Smart Matching
matching.description: Concepts are matched to your course syllabus with confidence scores. Track exactly what you've learned vs. what's required.

repetition.title: Spaced Repetition
repetition.description: Review flashcards at optimal intervals. Just 3-5 minutes daily ensures long-term retention of everything you learn.

cta.title: Ready to Remember Everything?
cta.description: Join students who are transforming their passive content consumption into active learning

howItWorks.title: From Passive Consumption to Active Retention
howItWorks.description: No manual flashcard creation. No note-taking. No organizing. Just learn.

upload.title: Upload Your Syllabus
upload.description: PDF, text, or talk to our AI to define your learning goals. Works for any course, any educational system worldwide.

watch.title: Watch Content You're Already Consuming
watch.description: YouTube videos, articles, PDFs. No behavior change required. Just paste the URL or upload the file.

extract.title: AI Extracts & Matches Concepts
extract.description: Within 60 seconds, concepts are extracted and matched to your syllabus. See exactly what you've learned vs. what's missing.

review.title: Review 3 Min/Day
review.description: Spaced repetition schedules optimal review times. Flashcards unlock as you master concepts. 80% retention after 7 days.

pain.title: You're Already Learning...
pain.subtitle: But without a retention system, you're forgetting 85% within 2 weeks.

without.title: üòû Learning Without Recall
items: Can't recall key concepts when needed

with.title: üòé Learning WITH Recall
items: See exactly what you know vs. don't know

forgetting.text: of learning forgotten in 2 weeks without a system

trustSignals.title: Zettelkasten Methodology + Spaced Repetition + AI Automation

zettelkasten.title: Zettelkasten
zettelkasten.description: Knowledge graph methodology used by Nobel Prize winners. Atomic notes, typed links, hierarchical structure.

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition
spacedRepetition.description: Proven cognitive science technique. Review at optimal intervals for long-term retention (80% after 7 days).

aiAutomation.title: AI Automation
aiAutomation.description: GPT-4 + embeddings for concept extraction and matching. 68%+ accuracy, improving daily with user feedback.

beta.title: Currently in Beta
beta.description: We're testing with early users to improve accuracy before launching paid plans. Join now to get early access and help shape the product.

matching.title: Smart Syllabus Matching
matching.description: Concepts are matched to your course syllabus with confidence scores. Track exactly what you've learned vs. what's required.

progress.title: Visual Progress Tracking
progress.description: See your knowledge graph grow. Track which concepts are locked, unlocked, or mastered.

repetition.title: Spaced Repetition
repetition.description: Review flashcards at optimal intervals. Just 3-5 minutes daily ensures long-term retention.

analytics.title: Learning Analytics
analytics.description: Track your retention rate, review streaks, and concept mastery over time.
